discussion.p: Currently, generator::iterator::operator== pass iterator by value. Given that iterator is a move-only type, this makes it impossible for generator to model range, since default_sentinel cannot be compared to the iterator of const lvalue and is not eligible to be its sentinel.

resolution.p: This wording is relative to the working draft snapshot from 2022-09-03.

blockquote.pre: friend bool operator==(const iterator& i, default_sentinel_t);
